definition: to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head

sentences.english: The domestic caustic soda production techniques by diaphragm method and ion-exchange membrane method at present are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了当前国内隔膜法和离子膜法烧碱的生产技术。

sentences.english: The preparation of laminated crystalline sodium silicate from flake caustic soda was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 对用片状烧碱制备层状结晶硅酸钠进行了探讨。

sentences.english: The results of experiment indicate that whole cotton stalk pulp by KP cooking is better than that by soda-AQ cooking.
sentences.chinese: 从实验结果看出全棉秆蒸煮硫酸盐法好于烧碱蒽醌法。

sentences.english: Some of the color usually stays on while its in the caustic soda, but it wipes right off.
sentences.chinese: 一些通常的颜色，而停留在其在烧碱，但马上擦拭。

sentences.english: The running situation of the electrochemical rectification facility in Hengyang Caustic Soda Plant of Hunan Province was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了湖南省衡阳烧碱厂电化学整流装置的运行情况。

sentences.english: This new method had advantage over the caustic soda lime one, despite its higher sodium hydroxide consumption.
sentences.chinese: 该法比烧碱石灰法有诸多优点，碱耗较高是其不足。

sentences.english: Design plot of land is the site of caustic soda plant in Taizhou, which belongs to the brownfields range.
sentences.chinese: 设计地块原址为台州烧碱厂，属于棕地改造的范围。

sentences.english: The modifications of caustic soda facility and production techniques of chlor-alkali plant of Qilu Petrochemical Inc. are summarized.
sentences.chinese: 总结了齐鲁氯碱厂烧碱装置及生产技术的改进。

definition: sodium carbonate Na2CO3/soda ash/same as 碳酸鈉|碳酸钠
